49//*****************************************************************************
50#ifndef AM_HAL_ADC_H
51#define AM_HAL_ADC_H
52
53//*****************************************************************************
54//
56//
57//*****************************************************************************
58#define ADCn(n) ((ADC_Type*)(ADC_BASE + (n * (ADC_BASE - ADC_BASE))))
59
60// ****************************************************************************
61//
71//
72// ****************************************************************************
73#define AM_HAL_ADC_VREF 1.19F
74#define AM_HAL_ADC_VREFMV 1190 // Vref specified in millivolts
75#define AM_HAL_ADC_VREFMVF (AM_HAL_ADC_VREF * 1000.0F)
77
78//*****************************************************************************
79//
85//
86//*****************************************************************************
87#define AM_HAL_ADC_SAMPLE_BITS (12) // Number of bits in the sample
88#define AM_HAL_ADC_SAMPLE_2N (1 << AM_HAL_ADC_SAMPLE_BITS) // Exponentiation of 2^^n
89#define AM_HAL_ADC_SAMPLE_DIVISOR AM_HAL_ADC_SAMPLE_2N // Divisor for 12 bits
90#define AM_HAL_ADC_SAMPLE_DIVISORF ((float)AM_HAL_ADC_SAMPLE_2N) // Divisor for 12 bits
91#define AM_HAL_ADC_SAMPLE_MASK ((AM_HAL_ADC_SAMPLE_2N - 1) << 6) // Mask for integer portion of the sample
92#define AM_HAL_ADC_SAMPLE_MASK_FULL (((1 << (AM_HAL_ADC_SAMPLE_BITS + 6)) - 1)) // Mask for the full sample
94
95// ****************************************************************************
96//
98//
99// ****************************************************************************
100#define AM_HAL_ADC_MAX_SLOTS 8
101
102
103// ****************************************************************************
104//
106//
107// ****************************************************************************
108#define AM_HAL_ADC_CRM_CLKSRC_POS (0)
109#define AM_HAL_ADC_CRM_CLKSRC_MSK (0x000000FF)
110#define AM_HAL_ADC_CRM_CLKDIV_POS (8)
111#define AM_HAL_ADC_CRM_CLKDIV_MSK (0x0000FF00)
112
113// ****************************************************************************
114//
116// Errata ERR091: TRKCYC must be minimum of 32
117//
118// ****************************************************************************
119#define AM_HAL_ADC_MIN_TRKCYC 32
120
121// ****************************************************************************
122//
124//
125// ****************************************************************************
126#define AM_HAL_ADC_TEMPSENSOR_SLOPE 290.0F
127
128// ****************************************************************************
129//
132//
133// ****************************************************************************
134typedef enum
135{
137 AM_HAL_ADC_CLKSEL_HFRC_48MHZ = ((CRM_ADCCRM_ADCCLKSEL_HFRC_48MHz << AM_HAL_ADC_CRM_CLKSRC_POS) | \
138 (0 << AM_HAL_ADC_CRM_CLKDIV_POS)),
139
141 AM_HAL_ADC_CLKSEL_HFRC_24MHZ = ((CRM_ADCCRM_ADCCLKSEL_HFRC_48MHz << AM_HAL_ADC_CRM_CLKSRC_POS) | \
142 (1 << AM_HAL_ADC_CRM_CLKDIV_POS)),
143
145 AM_HAL_ADC_CLKSEL_PLL_POSTDIV = ((CRM_ADCCRM_ADCCLKSEL_PLLPOSTDIV << AM_HAL_ADC_CRM_CLKSRC_POS) | \
146 (0 << AM_HAL_ADC_CRM_CLKDIV_POS)),
147
149 AM_HAL_ADC_CLKSEL_OFF,
150} am_hal_adc_clksel_e;
151
152// ****************************************************************************
153//
156//
157// ****************************************************************************
158typedef enum
159{
160 AM_HAL_ADC_RPTTRIGSEL_TMR,
161 AM_HAL_ADC_RPTTRIGSEL_INT
162} am_hal_adc_rpttrigsel_e;

168//

171{
172 AM_HAL_ADC_TRIGPOL_RISING,
173 AM_HAL_ADC_TRIGPOL_FALLING
174} am_hal_adc_trigpol_e;
175
176// ****************************************************************************
177//
180//
181// ****************************************************************************
182typedef enum
183{
184 AM_HAL_ADC_TRIGSEL_EXT0,
185 AM_HAL_ADC_TRIGSEL_EXT1,
186 AM_HAL_ADC_TRIGSEL_EXT2,
187 AM_HAL_ADC_TRIGSEL_EXT3,
188 AM_HAL_ADC_TRIGSEL_VCOMP,
189 AM_HAL_ADC_TRIGSEL_SOFTWARE = 7
190} am_hal_adc_trigsel_e;
191
192// ****************************************************************************
193//
196//
197// ****************************************************************************
198typedef enum
199{
200 AM_HAL_ADC_CLKMODE_LOW_POWER, // Disable the clock between scans for LPMODE0.
201 // Set LPCKMODE to 0x1 while configuring the ADC.
202 AM_HAL_ADC_CLKMODE_LOW_LATENCY // Low Latency Clock Mode. When set, HFRC and the
203 // adc_clk will remain on while in functioning in LPMODE0.
204} am_hal_adc_clkmode_e;
205
206// ****************************************************************************
207//
210//
211// ****************************************************************************
212typedef enum
213{
214 AM_HAL_ADC_LPMODE0, // Low Latency Clock Mode. When set, HFRC and the adc_clk
215 // will remain on while in functioning in LPMODE0.
216 AM_HAL_ADC_LPMODE1 // Powers down all circuity and clocks associated with the
217 // ADC until the next trigger event. Between scans, the reference
218 // buffer requires up to 50us of delay from a scan trigger event
219 // before the conversion will commence while operating in this mode.
220} am_hal_adc_lpmode_e;
221
222// ****************************************************************************
223//
226//
227// ****************************************************************************
228typedef enum
229{
230 AM_HAL_ADC_SINGLE_SCAN,
231 AM_HAL_ADC_REPEATING_SCAN
232} am_hal_adc_repeat_e;
233

235//
238//
239// ****************************************************************************

242 AM_HAL_ADC_SLOT_AVG_1,
243 AM_HAL_ADC_SLOT_AVG_2,
244 AM_HAL_ADC_SLOT_AVG_4,
245 AM_HAL_ADC_SLOT_AVG_8,
246 AM_HAL_ADC_SLOT_AVG_16,
247 AM_HAL_ADC_SLOT_AVG_32,
248 AM_HAL_ADC_SLOT_AVG_64,
249 AM_HAL_ADC_SLOT_AVG_128
250} am_hal_adc_meas_avg_e;

283 // Miscellaneous other signals.

534//*****************************************************************************
535//
542//
543//*****************************************************************************
544#define AM_HAL_ADC_INT_DERR (_VAL2FLD(ADC_INTEN_DERR, 1))
545#define AM_HAL_ADC_INT_DCMP (_VAL2FLD(ADC_INTEN_DCMP, 1))
546#define AM_HAL_ADC_INT_WCINC (_VAL2FLD(ADC_INTEN_WCINC, 1))
547#define AM_HAL_ADC_INT_WCEXC (_VAL2FLD(ADC_INTEN_WCEXC, 1))
548#define AM_HAL_ADC_INT_FIFOOVR2 (_VAL2FLD(ADC_INTEN_FIFOOVR2, 1))
549#define AM_HAL_ADC_INT_FIFOOVR1 (_VAL2FLD(ADC_INTEN_FIFOOVR1, 1))
550#define AM_HAL_ADC_INT_SCNCMP (_VAL2FLD(ADC_INTEN_SCNCMP, 1))
551#define AM_HAL_ADC_INT_CNVCMP (_VAL2FLD(ADC_INTEN_CNVCMP, 1))
553
554//*****************************************************************************
555//
576//
577//*****************************************************************************
578#define AM_HAL_ADC_FIFO_SAMPLE(value) (_FLD2VAL(ADC_FIFO_DATA, value) >> 6)
579#define AM_HAL_ADC_FIFO_FULL_SAMPLE(value) (_FLD2VAL(ADC_FIFO_DATA, value))
580#define AM_HAL_ADC_FIFO_SLOT(value) (_FLD2VAL(ADC_FIFO_SLOTNUM, value))
581#define AM_HAL_ADC_FIFO_COUNT(value) (_FLD2VAL(ADC_FIFO_COUNT, value))
